sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id: 1, data: '', loaded: false } // componentDidMount() { // axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) // .then((response) => { // this.setState({data: response.data}) // }) // } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { if(prevState.id != this.props.currentId) { console.log('calling') this.setState({id: this.props.currentId , loaded : !this.state.loaded}) } if(!this.state.loaded) { this.setState({id: this.props.currentId}) } } render() { console.log(this.state.data) return (
